review: This is an amazing device....if you have Prime you should have this.When our cable contract is up we will be replacing it with this device. For the price of Prime we can watch all the movies we want for a fraction of the cost for 300+ channels we don't watch.The kids already love and use Prime more than watching their TV's so this will just make a great addition especially for when we travel out of town to use in hotels.
